horizontal_priorities.name: Inclusion and Diversity
horizontal_priorities.description: Promoting equal opportunities and access for people with fewer opportunities
horizontal_priorities.details: This priority addresses physical, mental, educational, cultural, social, economic, and geographical barriers that prevent participation in society and accessing opportunities offered by the Erasmus+ Programme.

horizontal_priorities.name: Digital Transformation
horizontal_priorities.description: Supporting digital readiness, resilience, and capacity
horizontal_priorities.details: Supporting the development of a high-performing digital education ecosystem and enhancing digital literacy and skills across society. Aims to help citizens of all ages acquire the digital skills and competences they need to live, learn, work, and exercise their rights.

horizontal_priorities.name: Environment and Fight Against Climate Change
horizontal_priorities.details: Raising awareness about global warming and developing skills in sustainability-relevant sectors. Prioritizing projects aimed at changing consumption habits and lifestyles, developing green sectorial skills strategies.

horizontal_priorities.name: Participation in Democratic Life, Common Values and Civic Engagement
horizontal_priorities.details: Promoting citizens' right to participate in democratic life and encouraging active involvement at local, national and European levels. Supporting development of critical thinking, media literacy, civic and intercultural skills.

adult_education_priorities.name: Increasing Take-up and Inclusiveness
adult_education_priorities.description: Empowering adults to participate in training and reducing skills gaps
adult_education_priorities.details: Empowering adults to participate in training, reducing skills gaps and labor market shortages, building on individual learning accounts and enabling frameworks.

adult_education_priorities.name: Improving Learning Availability and Accessibility
adult_education_priorities.description: Creating flexible learning offers adapted to adult needs
adult_education_priorities.details: Creating and developing flexible learning offers adapted to the learning needs of adults, developing digital and blended learning opportunities, supporting validation of skills through micro-credentials.

adult_education_priorities.name: Promoting Local Learning Environments
adult_education_priorities.description: Supporting community learning centers and local initiatives
adult_education_priorities.details: Supporting local learning centers, libraries, civil society to promote social inclusion and civic engagement. Exploiting digital technologies for community learning and offering lifelong and life-wide learning opportunities.

adult_education_priorities.name: Creating Upskilling Pathways
adult_education_priorities.description: Enhancing key competences for adults with low skill levels
adult_education_priorities.details: Promoting new adult education opportunities particularly for adults with low level of skills, knowledge and competences. Creating pathways allowing adult learners to enhance key competences and progress towards higher qualifications.

adult_education_priorities.name: Improving Educator Competences
adult_education_priorities.description: Developing competences of educators and adult education staff
adult_education_priorities.details: Developing staff competences that lead to overall improvements in provision, targeting and effectiveness of adult education. Supporting innovative teaching methods and strengthening motivational and advisory roles.

adult_education_priorities.name: Intergenerational Learning
adult_education_priorities.description: Creating learning opportunities across age groups
adult_education_priorities.details: Creating learning opportunities that bring together different age groups, building understanding of European values, strengthening European identity and social cohesion between generations.

adult_education_priorities.name: Quality Assurance
adult_education_priorities.description: Developing quality assurance mechanisms for adult education
adult_education_priorities.details: Developing better quality assurance mechanisms for adult learning policies and provision, creating monitoring methodologies to measure effectiveness and track progress of adult learners.

adult_education_priorities.name: Supporting Ukrainian Refugees
adult_education_priorities.description: Inclusive approaches for refugee integration and support
adult_education_priorities.details: Implementing inclusive pedagogical approaches, providing language learning facilities, supporting psycho-social well-being of learners and staff affected by the refugee crisis.

selection_rules.requirement: Projects must address at least one horizontal priority OR one sector-specific priority
selection_rules.evaluation_note: Priority alignment directly impacts evaluation scoring and funding eligibility
selection_rules.national_context: National Agencies may give more consideration to priorities particularly relevant in their national context
